page.title: 16THE CHURCHES -WENT HILLS
page.content: The parish church at Darrington is outside the boundary of our area, although the area lies within its parish. Wentbridge has its own church, but this is really a chapel of ease built by Mrs. Hatchard of Hillthorpe in 1878. It replaced an earlier church dedicated to John the Baptist. Both villages once had non-conformist chapels, but the one in Wentbridge has been converted into a house, whilst the Darrington Chapel, after being unused for several years, is now the Farm Shop. Members of the Darrington Chapel have held meetings in a home not far from the chapel itself. We are not sure if these are still being held. There are no non-Christian religious groups.
